__TOC__

Below is a table showing the Bluetooth hardware we have tested with.  This includes the chipsets on the computers themselves as well as some client devices.

To find out your Bluetooth chipset vendor is you can show the MAC address with:

hcitool dev

Then paste the MAC address in to:
https://macaddresschanger.com/bluetooth-mac-lookup

Only add the first three octets to the table.
